PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: There’s No Time for Staggering Struts!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Takes half as much Stagger damage from attacks and deflects.

PassiveDesc.Name: We Could Use a Helping Hand, Actually~?
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the second Scene, uses a Combat Page that Stupefies the librarian with the highest HP. Once a librarian snaps out of Stupefaction, the page will be used in 2 Scenes.

PassiveDesc.Name: Collaborative Performance
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the Scene: give 1 Strength, 1 Endurance, and 3 Protection to the Stupefied librarian. When the librarian is Staggered: take 60 Stagger damage at the end of the Scene. After librarians are freed from Stupefaction 2 times, uses a Mass Attack page on the following Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Twas a Joy to Perform by Your Side…!
PassiveDesc.Desc: When this character is defeated, Oswald takes 40 Stagger damage at the end of the Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.
